item.title: An Overview Of My Network
item.description: Network Infrastructure Breakdown: My network consists of two Ubiquiti EdgeRouter Xs & two Cisco Catalyst switches. Wireguard is the VPN tunneling protocol used to connect external devices to the network. Additional Info My Home LAN Ubiquiti EdgeRouter X - erx.zahid.lan Cisco 3560G - core.zahid.lan SVIs for VLANs Raspberry Pi 4B 8GB - pi.zahid.lan Running as a host for Docker containers 120GB M.
